channel.title: Custom items wiled in wrong place
channel.description:
hey i was wondering if anyone could tell me what im doing wrong because i added a whoole bunch of customs to my client and i go to wiled them and they wield on the wepon thing
like if i wielded a helm it goes to a wepon and the armour looks messed up here is a pic If you can help me or give me advice id appreciate it alot! [img]http://www.blacknscape.info/images/mop/customs.bmp[/img] [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2009, 03:35:59 pm[/size][hr]sorry wrong Section Please Delete!

item.title: Custom items wiled in wrong place
item.dc:creator: @wwe4eva wwe4eva
item.description:
@wwe4eva wrote:

This is the right section…

Item.java, put the item ID’s into the different slots, depending on what it is.

For helms,

put them in everything that goes on your head.

Read full topic
item.source: Custom items wiled in wrong place
